#summary GermplasmTraitMeasurement
#labels TERMS

Characterization & Evaluation data (C&E) are measurements of crop traits. This data type is considered to be important for the effective use of plant genetic resources conserved ex situ in the large seed collections (genebanks).


= Trait Descriptors =

<img src='http://darwincore-germplasm.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/images/illustrations/beans_5mm_grid.png' align='right' width='200px' />

 * _dwc:measurementMethod_ [[http://rs.tdwg.org/dwc/terms/index.htm#measurementMethod]]

 === DwC germplasm terms ===
 * *[GermplasmTraitID]* (epgris3_trait:TRAIT_NUMBER)
 * *GermplasmTraitIdentifier* (epgris3_trait:TRAIT_NAME)
 * *GermplasmTraitClass*
 * *GermplasmTraitSource*
 * *GermplasmTraitScale*
 * *GermplasmTraitRemarks* (epgris3_trait:TRAIT_REMARK)
